TopicTitle: How to rendezvous with an asteroid outside Kerbin's SOI?

Articles.Content:
If you want to meet up with an asteroid BEFORE it gets to Kerbin's SOI, I just made a tutorial thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75759-Asteroid-Rendezvous-Outside-of-Kerbin%E2%80%99s-SOI

I hope it's useful. Good luck!
